meta.content: Education; Corrections; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

abstract.p: Correction of May 26 article about Yeshiva University's commencement, which included erroneous reference from university to appearance of Dr Deborah E Lipstadt

block.p: An article yesterday about Yeshiva University's commencement included an erroneous reference from the university to the appearance of Dr. Deborah E. Lipstadt, a historian of the Holocaust who received an honorary doctorate. This was not her first public appearance since her victory in April in a libel suit against a British writer who has denied the Holocaust. Dr. Lipstadt spoke earlier in May at the American Jewish Committee meeting in Washington.
